lyric:
[00:00.000] 作词 : Patrick Stump/Pete Wentz/Joe Trohman/Andy Hurley
[00:01.000] 作曲 : Patrick Stump/Pete Wentz/Joe Trohman/Andy Hurley
[00:08.71]We’ve gone way too fast for way too long
[00:16.86]And we were never supposed to make it half this far
[00:25.94]And I lived so much life, lived so much life
[00:30.72]I think that God is gonna have to kill me twice
[00:35.34]Kill me twice like my name was Nikki Sixx
[00:39.53]I woke up in my shoes again but somewhere you exist singing
[00:44.77]Oops I, did it again, I forgot what I was losing my mind about
[00:52.11]Oh, I only wrote this down to make you press rewind
[00:57.89]And send a message that I was young and a menace
[01:02.46]Young and a menace (chopped sample)
[01:37.11]Woke up on the wrong side of reality
[01:43.67]And there’s a madness that’s just coursing right through me
[01:54.51]And as far as the time, far as the time
[01:59.57]Not sure I’m there yet but I’m searching out the ride
[02:03.93]Oops I, did it again, I forgot what I was losing my mind about
[02:12.18]Oh, I only wrote this down to make you press rewind
[02:18.19]And send a message that I was young and a menace
[02:22.42]Young and a menace (chopped sample)
[02:39.24]If I am off the deep end
[02:42.91]I’m just here to become the best yet
[02:47.60]I’m just here for the psych assessment
[02:51.94]I’m just here for the for the
[02:58.12]Young and a menace (chopped sample)
[03:31.95]We’ve gone way too fast for way too long
[03:40.13]
tlyric:
[by:EnderCrafter]
[00:08.71]我们漫长一路走得甚是匆忙
[00:16.86]却从未曾想能走过这旅途的一半之长
[00:25.94]活了如此之久，漫漫人生一段
[00:30.72]我想也够上帝杀我两次
[00:35.34]像Nikki Sixx一样（过量用药曾两度徘徊在死亡边缘的一位低音乐器演奏手）
[00:39.53]现在我已回到现实中来，可不知何处总有你（年轻的自己）歌声传来
[00:44.77]糟糕我又忘了我在想些什么
[00:52.11]哦，我写下这首歌只是为了让你想起从前的我
[00:57.89]告诉你我只是个年轻气盛惹是生非的祸端罢了
[01:02.46]年轻气盛惹是生非的祸端
[01:37.11]在真理的对立面醒来
[01:43.67]疯狂的思绪贯穿我脑海
[01:54.51]远如时间般浩瀚
[01:59.57]尚不明了但我仍在不停窥探
[02:03.93]糟糕我又忘了我在想些什么
[02:12.18]哦，我写下这首歌只是为了让你想起从前的我
[02:18.19]告诉你我只是个年轻气盛惹是生非的祸端罢了
[02:22.42]年轻气盛惹是生非的祸端
[02:39.24]若我从这深渊中逃离出来
[02:42.91]只是为了去做那最好的自己而已
[02:47.60]只是去换一个心理评估的结果证明自己不是个疯子而已
[02:51.94]只是为了...为了...
[02:58.12]年轻气盛惹是生非的祸端
[03:31.95]你我漫长一路走得甚是匆忙
